50% Off our cPanel SSD Shared & Reseller Hosting for life! This deal is recurring and has no set expiry date. We offer locations in Manchester, UK and Charlotte, USA. **Ho-ost** is a brand of **Ho-ost Internet Solutions Limited**. Registered in England and Wales. Company #09970768.
 
  >**Our Features**
   >-
    >* Free IPv6 When Requested
    >* Servers Running Latest cPanel
    >* CloudLinux For Noisy Neighbours
    >* Pure SSD (Solid State Drive) 
    >* Utilising Latest MariaDB SQL
    >* Free JetBackup Remote Backups
    >* Free Softaculous Apps Installer
    >* Free CloudFlare Addon Available
    >* Free SSL Certificates (AutoSSL)
    >* Free Domain On Specified Plan
    >* Free cPanel > cPanel Migration
    >* Free Site.Pro Webbuilder (UK)
    >* 30 Day Money Back Guarantee**
    >* Fast Friendly Customer Support
    >* Instant Service Setup Available
   
  
<center>
 
**Notice:** If you choose to pay using a PayPal Subscriptions Payment, please be aware that you will be billed and charged on a recurring basis as long as that agreement remains between you and PayPal. It is your responsibility to cancel or amend said billing agreement if necessary. Unmetered Bandwidth mentioned in certain plans is under fair share usage. Our Money Back Guarantee is subject to terms. 

</center>
